> Overview of climate indicators, including their abbreviations, descriptive definitions, groups (with "mixed" referring to indicators derived from multiple input variables from different groups), input parameters and temporal aggregation periods.

| Index             | Description                                                                                | Group         | Parent Parameter | Temporal Aggregation |
|-------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------|------------------|----------------------|
| `TGmean`          | Average daily mean temperature                                                             | temperature   | TG               | yea+sea              |
| `TNmean`          | Average daily minimum temperature                                                          | temperature   | TN               | yea+sea              |
| `TXmean`          | Average daily maximum temperature                                                          | temperature   | TX               | yea+sea              |
| `FD`              | Number of frost days                                                                       | temperature   | TN               | yea+sea              |
| `SU`              | Number of summer days                                                                      | temperature   | TX               | yea+sea              |
| `HD`              | Number of hot days                                                                         | temperature   | TX               | yea+sea              |
| `ID`              | Number of icing days                                                                       | temperature   | TX               | yea+sea              |
| `TR`              | Number of tropical nights                                                                  | temperature   | TN               | yea+sea              |
| `KYS`             | Kysely episodes                                                                            | temperature   | TX               | yea+sea              |
| `GSL`             | Growing season length                                                                      | temperature   | TG               | yea                  |
| `GSS`             | Growing season start                                                                       | temperature   | TG               | yea                  |
| `spring_backlash` | Backlash onset / spring frost                                                              | temperature   | TG+TN            | yea                  |
| `SBI`             | Spring backlash index                                                                      | temperature   | TG+TN            | yea                  |
| `TXx`             | Maximum daily maximum temperature                                                          | temperature   | TX               | yea+sea              |

| `CFD`             | Consecutive frost days                                                                     | temperature   | TN               | yea+sea              |
